DOC.brief_summary: Cesarean delivery prevalent . Unlike operation , quick recovery require mother nurture newborn child establish appropriate mother-child bonding . Therefore , effective pain management crucial . In study would like compare two pain reliever ' administration protocol : ( 1 ) pain reliever ' administration fix protocol ( type medication , dose interval ) ( 2 ) pain reliever ' administration follow demand ( type dos , however , medication give follow patient 's request ) . The primary outcome patient satisfaction , pain control necessity additional medication ( rescue dos ) . The protocol use first 48 hour follow surgery .
DOC.brief_title: To Compare Efficacy Patient 's Satisfaction From Pain Management Women After Cesarean Section Pain Relievers ' Administration Fix Protocol Compared Protocol Following Demand
DOC.criteria: woman underwent cesarean section Women suffer chronic pain Women use chronic pain medication Allergy drug use study Women underwent general anesthesia surgery woman elevate liver enzyme
